name: Pages API
description: An API to automatically add pages to Quick Search and CreatorLayer

menulayer-right-menu.name: MenuLayer Right Menu
menulayer-right-menu.description: Enable pages on the right menu of the MenuLayer

menulayer-bottom-menu.name: MenuLayer Bottom Menu
menulayer-bottom-menu.description: Enable pages on the bottom menu of the MenuLayer

creator-layer-menu.name: CreatorLayer Menu
creator-layer-menu.description: Enable pages on the CreatorLayer menu

level-search-layer-quick-search-menu.name: LevelSearchLayer Quick Search Menu
level-search-layer-quick-search-menu.description: Enable pages on the LevelSearchLayer Quick Search menu

pause-layer-menu.name: PauseLayer Menu
pause-layer-menu.description: Enable pages on the PauseLayer menu

levelinfolayer-left-menu.name: LevelInfoLayer Left Menu
levelinfolayer-left-menu.description: Enable pages on the LevelInfoLayer left menu
